@@ -36,7 +36,7 @@

Introduction

Hence you need:
    -
  1. Java SE Development Kit 6 (version 1.6.0-23 or higher) installed;
    2. +
  2. Java SE Development Kit 7 or higher installed;
  3. Apache Maven (version 3.0.3 or higher) installed;
  4. Some basic knowledge about Maven;
  5. Some basic knowledge about Maven WAR overlays;
